TLINE.TDLINE: <ZU>Middle screen (Transport Request Statutes ALV)</>
This ALV displays the differents statutes with the date and time of
transport requests selected for each system in the SAP landscape.
Moreover, it displays also several additional information as:
- Transport request information : Description, owner (Id,
firstname, lastname), comment text.
- SHERLOCK status : If this field is blank, SHERLOCK isn't yet
processed for the transport request
After ALV displaying, application toolbar shows additional buttons.
These buttons can be used to realize actions on Transport request in TRS
ALV ( for more information see the corresponding button documentation).
Regarding TRS ALV toolbar, you can use the following functionalities :
- Display TR detail using icon @16@ to show a particular ALV
line in foreground
- Refresh the ALV data using icon @42@
- Manage column sorts using icons @3E@ and @3F@
- Search a string chain in ALV data using icons @13@ and @4E@
- Set column filters using icon @4G@
- Manage ALV layout options using icon @LZ@
Regarding Status icons, 5 values can be displayed :
- @EB@ : Only for Development system. Displayed when the
transport request isn't yet released
- @0A@ : For all systems. Displayed when transport request
importation or exportation step is processed with errors
- @09@ : For all systems. Displayed when transport request
importation or exportation step is processed with warnings
- @08@ : For all systems. Displayed when transport request
importation or exportation step is processed successfully
- Empty cell : Not relevant for Development system. Displayed
when the transport request import step isn't yet done.
Regarding the TR comment text cell, 2 values can be displayed :
- @0P@ : A comment exists for the corresponding transport
request
- Empty cell : No comment exists
Regarding the Sherlock statutes cell, 3 values can be displayed :
- @02@ : Sherlock checks are processed with errors
- @01@ : Sherlock checks are processed successfully
- Empty cell : Sherlock checks aren't yet processed for the
transport request
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_APPLICATION_HELP>Return to documentation</>
